strings.Value: "Merciful doesn't mean spineless. In one hand, Sarenrae holds a healing light, in the other â€“ a killing sword!"

"I know you are good with your little sword. And you don't run away in a fight. But after a battle you always have that face, like you just swallowed a hedgehog. What's the point of fighting if you don't enjoy it?"
"You might be surprised to hear this, boy-priest, but I was that sword, and I've cut down many. Perhaps even more than you."
